website_summaries.verdict: This versatile option comes with an AC power cord for home use and a DC adapter for on-the-run inflating. A bit slower than other plug-in models, but worth the wait if you don't want a battery powered pump.
pros: Comes with both AC and DC power cords for indoor and outdoor use
Highly effective, and the noise level isn't over the top
cons: Not the most powerful pump on our list

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Air Pump
customer_reviews.text: I did a LOT of research before I purchased this product. The reviews said this was the best one for the money and I sure made a good choice because this pump does everything it says it will do and it works very well. Blew up and deflated my giant rainbow unicorn pegasus twice and had no problem. Love how small it is to pack away and store.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, inflates a queen air mattress in three or four minutes. The cords are nice and long, and I appreciate that it comes with both AC and DC plugs. The only negative is the build quality. It's very light and the switch feels cheap. We'll see how it holds up long term. Overall, I'd definitely recommend it for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Danny H.

customer_reviews.title: Fine if you dont need to deflate
customer_reviews.text: I have been a hospice aide. I bought a hair washing, inflatable unit. I needed a pump. Well, luckily I decided to test at home 1st. This pump inflated the unit pretty efficiently. However, the attachments didnt even fit into the deflator part. So, I tested taking it down manually & it was too lengthy a process. Too me, this thing, the pump. Feels cheap. I'm gonna keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Not quick-fill, very weak compared to other plug in
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to see that there's a pump that has both options of AC and DC plug in. However, I plugged it in right when it arrived to fill up an inflatable bed and it sounded like a pump with weak batteries in it. I have another pump that looks identical but inflates at maybe double the speed. I can't say how long this will last but this thing is going back because it's not "Quick-Fill" as described.
customer_reviews.author: The Hungry Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Can work with wall AC and DC power as well!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to inflate air mattresses. It works wonderful! I really like that it is cheaper than I could find at Walmart. It comes quickly! Mine arrived the next day. I really love that it has the ability to plug into the house AND plug into DC. That versatility held when guests come and were inflate indoors. No heavy batteries or power banks, just a simple wall outlet. We still can use it camping with the DC plug. Someone was thinking and made this practical. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Cappy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This pump is small, but works great. I filled some really big water blow-ups this year. The cord is long enough to reach outside the car enough to allow things to fill all the way. Has had all the parts I needed. The only thing I really did like was that I couldn't fit it all back in the box once I opened it! So I made a little bag for it so I could keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: Amberly Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pump that works A/C & D/C ( That was the big difference from others and why I went with this one ) , you also can use it to deflate by just spinning the pump around and connecting your item to the inlet instead of the outlet. Small and very simple to use, so far has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Ratboy

customer_reviews.title: Short cord, but easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for anything I have to blow up, it has multiple different plug sizes from teeny tiny, to a giant pool. I use it for my kids blow up swimming pool and it’s fantastic!! Easy to pull out and use. The one thing I don’t like about it would be the cord from the outlet, it’s very short. In order to reach the pool I had to get an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Ja-me

customer_reviews.title: Overheated and stopped working after 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I have an inflatable kayak that takes me about 8 minutes to inflate with a hand pump. I figured I could save myself a few minutes and some arm strength for rowing by purchasing this. After 5 minutes on one side, I thought "this actually seems to be taking longer than the hand pump." My sister laughed and said it couldn't be. Then it overheated so I switched to the handpump for the other side and we were both amazed to find it literally took half the time. I am returning this product and can not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MidWestMomto4

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool to make blowing up a raft a lot easier. What's great is that there is an adapter for your car and it also deflates. So if you use it at the beach you blow it up and deflate it right there.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah G.

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the worst pieces of equipment I've ever used in my life. I have no doubt these reviews are NOT legit. The attachments come off with the air, making it useless unless you have 3 hands! I ended up blowing up our inflatables by mouth more successfully than using this air pump! AVOID!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Smith

customer_reviews.title: How to buy replacements cords?
customer_reviews.text: This worked great the first time - I like how it came with a plug and adapter for the car. Until the dog ate the cord (it wasn't plugged in, thank god) and the motor starting to slow down - weird because we just bought it. I couldn't return because of the cord, or find a replacement cord for my life, which is weird because there are adapters everywhere (probably was me); I ended up buying a second one. That one works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brehm

customer_reviews.title: Deflate side doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The adapters hook up the the inflate side outlet, so you can inflate just fine. However, the deflate inlet is too big to hook up the adapters, so you can't deflate. Pretty big oversight IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Jimi

customer_reviews.title: Feels Cheap... but it is!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this item, I think that it is what I expected. It definitely feels like cheap, light plastic. However, it does work how it is supposed to. The only cons are that it does blow things up pretty slow and I don't know how well it will last over time because of the quality of material. However, for now it works good so I don't have any complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Jupiter

customer_reviews.title: Not a first choice.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recommend this product because it’s too frustrating. The nozzles don’t stay connected, so you’re standing there, holding everything firmly the whole time. Make sure your hair is firmly tied back too! I had several inches sucked into the second hole, and there was no way to get it out. It’s not an expensive pump though, and it seems to work. The pool has holes, so it’s inconclusive.
customer_reviews.author: Brat

customer_reviews.title: Better than my own breath, at least.
customer_reviews.text: The pump arrived quickly; that's great. It's compact and light; also great. It comes with a D/C adapter, car lighter adapter and several valve nozzles; yep, great. However, it is not very powerful, so inflating large items is slow-going. But, it beats standing there for an hour risking hyperventilation and sudden unconsciousness trying to blow it up with just my own lungs. It does the job, but just barely.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: The attachments are really hard to use because they are so short and don’t “snap” into place so you have to hold the unit the attachment and the floatie to be used... it also took FOREVER to blow the floatie up. my daughter blew hers up with her own air in the same time it took to use this... And the product is even harder to get back in the box for storage after use so now I am missing attachments in my trunk... if it wasn’t such a hassle With covid right now I would have returned the item!
customer_reviews.author: Lucifer206

customer_reviews.title: It is a 'must' BUT it has a short cable!
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty useful device and in case you want to use it for inflating the boat it is "Must". However, this product has a rather short cable. So once I use the car lighter for connection, I really have a hard time inflating the boat. The nozzles have low quality and sometimes it slipes from the top of the air pump. Finally, note that even with the electric air pump, you still need to have the manual air pump. This does the 90% of the job and you have to use a manual pump for the last 10%. But I guess this is a common feature of all-electric air pump and not specific to this item.
customer_reviews.author: Abdollah

customer_reviews.title: Sucks...instead of blows air
customer_reviews.text: Did not even work with the car charger part....Just didn't turn on at all. Worked with wall socket at home, but got to campsite and no luck...So now we stuck with a pump that doesn't do what we need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: KarateKids916

customer_reviews.title: Works great and fast
customer_reviews.text: we used this to fill up our river tubes and it worked great and fast. The regular plug in cord was really short and the car plug wasn't much longer which is really. Y only complaint because it made it a little difficult to get the tubes close enough but other than that it was exactly what we needed. It filled each tube in about 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Croston

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to have on hand!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two inner tubes and a raft for our swimming pool. Nowadays, these things come with a little flap inside the valve to prevent leakage, which makes it impossible to blow up manually. But, this little pump made quick work of it; it had the raft inflated in less than 5 minutes! It was worth the investment for these types of things while being a "snowbird" in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: FLNewGirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product has made my life so much easier 🙌🏼 We live in Hawaii and have two young kids. Beach days are all about the inflatables and with this product it faster. We plug it into our car and works like a charm. My husband had all the inflatables blown up and ready to go by the time I got the kids and everything else out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our river tubing vacation
customer_reviews.text: This has the car charger as well so if you need to transport your deflated tubes to the river you can reinflate them at the river. Only negative experience is it shutoff after overheating after inflating about 6 large inflatables in a row, which I would expect to happen given the size of the pump and motor.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A

customer_reviews.title: Functional, plugs into car lighter for power
customer_reviews.text: We were going on a last minute camping trip and realized we didn't have an air pump for our air mattress so I ordered this one on Amazon. It arrived quickly and it served it's purpose. I made sure it would fit our brand of mattress (Embark) and it did. I didn't check to see if I could have used batteries with it when I ordered, but we had our car on site and was able to blow the mattress up at the car and get it into our tent. Batteries would probably have been best for a camping situation, but it worked for us. Recommend as an affordable and efficient air pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dunyak

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: The device was very helpful. It wasnt the strongest when pumping up and took some time but it was effective. It was easy to use and the 3 different nozzles were very helpful. Plus it definitely pulls the air out of them faster than it pumps up. Overall good light weight product.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: Good pump, versatile attachment s
customer_reviews.text: The flexible power options, car cigarette lighter vs standard wall outlet make this item very useful. Works quickly on my daughter's giant pool raft. We have to deflate it to bring it to the community pool, and reinflate when we arrive. Works fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mufasa

customer_reviews.title: Struggling with deflation
customer_reviews.text: Held the pump for 15 - 20 minutes into the valve of inflated pool to deflate it and could not do even 50% successfully. inflation is also not great, have to hold it at place for long time, straining the hands. Used the deflation feature for the first time in 3-4 months after buying and have no way to return it.
customer_reviews.author: palek

customer_reviews.title: Great portable pump!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is AWESOME! It has three different nozzles to accommodate different hole openings. It comes with a standard wall outlet and a car outlet plug. It filled our extra large adult pool toy quickly. I’m sure it could manage a huge party float too! Would be nice if it came with a little carrying case for all the cords/attachments.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Cord too short.
customer_reviews.text: The power cord is ridiculously short. Comes unplugged constantly. I’m having to put an extension on it. I hate the thing. The pump works fine. But the cord length is a joke. And the box is no good for storage. Do box designers understand we store the products in these boxes!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. IORI

customer_reviews.title: I like the inflator as well as deflator
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it it inflates and deflates my portable pool takes forever to deflate and put away so this actually helped to do that much faster. it also inflated both the pool and things around it. overall, good value compact and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AngelM

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Pump
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm. It does a good job of inflating items quickly. And In just about the same amount of time it will deflate all the air out of something. My only complaint is that the AC power adapter plug is a bit on the short side. I would have liked to have seen the cord on it a few feet longer. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: jarath

customer_reviews.title: The car adapter makes it a 10/10!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! It’s so so perfect to keep in our car because we can quickly inflate + deflate our floats and boats at the lake. This helps us keep them organized and stowed away when not in use. The car adapter is where it’s at!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Used the 120 house plug. Inflated large unicorn float easily. Also removed air as easy, was able to fit float back into it's box for storage. Only down side is the adapter nozzzles do not stay on. Had to hold pump and nozzle together to use properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Manczuk

customer_reviews.title: Small lightweight OK for kid’s tube
customer_reviews.text: Took 5 minutes to fill the inner tube pictured, which was the main reason I bought it. Would prefer faster and would pay more if it was. This was AC 110V. Will try again with DC at the beach this weekend and hope it’s as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use blowing up pool floats and air mattresses. He was very pleased with the product. It is good quality, easy to use, small and lightweight. Much better than having to drag out an air compressor. And all at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works, car power chord is too short unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The product works well, both inflating and deflating. However, the power cable is too short to be powered from a car in an effective way. Had a hard time using this to inflate an airbed. This power cable has to be at-least 5 feet long to be useful for outdoor usage.
customer_reviews.author: Rav M

customer_reviews.title: Good little pump for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pump to go with an inflatable kayak and because it had 2 different plugs. One for an outlet and one for my car. We've used it several times and it's worked great. I use it to inflate and deflate my kayak and both get done quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Midaks

customer_reviews.title: Nice product power cords too short
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for my relaxation station. My only problem is the dc cord is to short. It made it hard to blow it up. Luckily my brother n laws car had an ac plug so I used a extension cord with it and blew it up quick
customer_reviews.author: David Agpalo

customer_reviews.title: 100% Quality Control failure
customer_reviews.text: There was apparently nothing inside the plastic "pump". No motor, no battery, no nothing. It felt completely empty. Just a piece of plastic that looked like a pump. Weighed about 2 oz. I think there's a little QC problem with these guys. "Charged" it for 24 hrs. As expected, it did nothing. I'd give it zero stars, but that option's not available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very compact, works well
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than I was expecting, which is actually good. It is compact and will store and go in boat easily. The little adapters go right on the pump with no hose, so it's a little tricky to use, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Shark

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pump was able to inflatable my paddle board in less than two minutes and was strong enough to provide the maximum 10 psi required to fully inflate the board. My only criticism is that the car adapter cord was to short to reach from the center console of my Ford Escape and allow the pump to rest on the ground/paddle board while inflating. I had to hold the pump in my hand while inflating. Not the end of the world since the pump inflated my paddle board quickly... but would've been nice to have a longer car adapter cord.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Storage bag please :)
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! It works great. Just wish it came with a storage bag or something. I keep it in the box which is getting torn up. I have nowhere else to store the pieces. But otherwise it works great and I do love it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the miney
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a couple of weeks now and have used it during a camp trip with the family to inflate a mattress, and a few inflatable toys. So far it is very easy to use and seems to be a good investment. I’ll update my review after I’ve had a chance to use it more and see how it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Khary O. Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This works adequately for the intended purpose; inflating and deflating small pool inflatables. It's not the most precisely engineered attachment system but works well for the price, so far
customer_reviews.author: Joan McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Useful If It Lasted Longer
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived faster than expected but it also failed to. Inflated 120x72x72 pool w/o issue but when attempting to inflate it on 2nd use, the unit starting smoking and died.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty is best adversary

customer_reviews.title: Works Quickly - Great Convenience!
customer_reviews.text: We blew up two big floats in minutes! The various attachments are great! We used it from the truck power socket but it’s great to have the plug in electric option also. I would definitely recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to have for camping,air mattresses. I personally bought because family came down and bought alot of huge floats for the lake. It really works fast,not load,filled really big floats in about 2 minutes. Highly recommend this pump
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.V

customer_reviews.title: Not good for towable boat toys
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as thought. I use it to inflate and deflate my towable boat toys. Takes a little longer than anticipated. Also not as strong to get a good acupressure fill. Good for pool floats thou
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great to inflate or deflate a boat etc.
customer_reviews.text: Use this one to inflate or deflate my Intec Excursion 5 boat.Works great inflating until a certain pressure has reached.That is ok so the rest will be done by hand air pump.It deflats the boat totally so it is good for storage. Wished the cable with the 12V plug had been longer to use the cars 12V outlet.Now I use the battery for it.
customer_reviews.author: MrV

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to deflate pool toys. The adapters, even though there are 3 of them, do not capable of fitting in the valves of the pool inflatables. I cannot inflate or deflate ANY of the inflatables.
customer_reviews.author: prettysassy

customer_reviews.title: Quick inflate
customer_reviews.text: We used this pump to inflate a swan floatie for the lake. It was very easy to use in our car and didn’t take long to inflate the swan. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: coolbrz

customer_reviews.title: It's an OK pump!
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok pump. The attachments do not stay on tbe pump or I would have given a 4 star review. It wasnt as powerful as I thought, I had to blow the inflatable up the rest of the way with my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Chula

customer_reviews.title: All the reviews saying it’s not that powerful I don’t agree
customer_reviews.text: For its size it’s pretty good it’s really similar to those pumps that blow up air mattress that you see in Walmart this one blows out slightly more air though and sounds different than the other one that I have that blows up an air mattress I have it blew up a 4 man raft in less than 10 min bought this one for the 12v if you don’t need that then just go pick one up in Walmart for $20
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Small, cheap, and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Versatile little pump. Very good value. Inflates and deflates with ease. I now have 1 at home, one at the cabin, and one on the boat. Have never had a problem with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Filled an airbed very quickly without having to go to the car! (I have a pump with a car attachment for camping, but didn't want to go out to the car in the rain to fill a mattress for the house.)
customer_reviews.author: Lori Mo.

customer_reviews.title: AC/DC operation a plus
customer_reviews.text: Worked great keeping Coleman air mattress firm during 6 day camping trip. Light weight and more powerful than I thought it would be. I like the dual power supply option.
customer_reviews.author: Savage

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We rented a vacation home with a pool and purchased all sorts of floats and tubes. The pump was easy to use and we had all our “toys” in the pool in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Works well and saves time
customer_reviews.text: After trying to blow up a 6 X 10 pool with a hand pump, the decision to get this was easy! Works well for inflating pools, floats etc and saves a lot of time and energy!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not quick at all takes forever to inflate items. Also don’t get this to inflate balloons, total waste of time
customer_reviews.author: REN

customer_reviews.title: Super fast
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two air mattresses this past weekend and needed an air pump to blow them up. This worked like a charm! Air mattress was blown up in under a minute and deflating it was just as easy and fast. It has three different sized nozzles that come with it and I know we'll be using it before the summer is out to blow up her inflatable pool. Great price and value for something that will save us a ton of time!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dollarhide

customer_reviews.title: Not as Easy as I thought
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use but it took far longer than I was expecting. If you have small tubes, balls or raft this product will work fine. It would take hours to fill a large tube
customer_reviews.author: David J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cord is too short
customer_reviews.text: Cord that plugs into truck is too short unless whatever you are inflating is inside your pickup. Not worth sending back, so it goes in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: dan hoover

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Barely inflates. I plugged it in for 15min to inflate an exercise ball and it barely did anything. I had much better success with a bicycle pump.
customer_reviews.author: Piperkat

customer_reviews.title: Not  working for inflatable baby pool it’s better to use mouth air
customer_reviews.text: This is trash product I bough a inflatable pool for baby it took half and hour so I did with my mouth I did it in five minutes waste of time and return the product
customer_reviews.author: Sonam j

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trip next month. I decided to try it out beforehand. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: WORST PIECE OF EQUIPMENT EVER
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the worst pieces of equipment I've ever used in my life. I have no doubt these reviews are NOT legit. It weighs less than a feather first off and does not fill even the smallest pool float. Extremely weak air pressure. Not to mention the attachments it comes with has no way of securing onto one another for different size floats. The air pushes the attachment out LOL. I'm beyond frustrated that this product was even allowed into production. Absolute joke.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Slow to fill anything
customer_reviews.text: I would not suggest getting this for large items to fill up like a blow up pool. It says don’t run it more than 20 min consistently but it’s going to take 40 to blow it up. It’s really slow ...I prefer the Coleman fast pump I had but you get what you pay for it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Worked well so far for me
customer_reviews.text: Have used a few times at home and once in the car on camping trip. Has worked well so far, feels like cheap Chinese product, I hope it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Haas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came with three different adapters to blow up different things. I also like that it came with the car adapter and the house adapter to use it, I specifically bought it for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: live this all the tabs for anything I need blown up. I use it so much when it’s summer and I need to inflate our pools !
customer_reviews.author: OkayMissTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Fails on delivery promise!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a pool party. Ordered on the 1st, was told it would be here by the 3rd.... then on the 3rd said wouldn’t be here till the 5th... shouldn’t fib on delivery date just to get orders. Left us blowing up 8 full size floats my mouth. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi B

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for only 5 seconds, no joke. Then the power dropped to probably 10% and delivered hardly any air to blow up our air mattress. I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: it works fine
customer_reviews.text: plain and simple it actually worked. blow up 2 person float for tubing....5 mins at the most, using 12 volt cigarette adapter
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for Inflatables.
customer_reviews.text: Great air pump for the price. I had to give 4 stars due to the cable length of cigarette lighter adapter cable which was short by 2 feet. Other then that it’s a great product for the money and it helps to deflate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Miranjali

customer_reviews.title: A necessity!
customer_reviews.text: This is a necessity! We bring this on the boat with us and it makes it so easy to inflate your floats. Without this it’s impossible to inflate your floats without passing out. Now we can anchor out multiple floats.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pat

customer_reviews.title: Deflate feature a waste!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot use the deflate feature because the nozzles will not fit on top. Inflated item well but the deflate feature is useless.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised. Blew up our twin air mattress for camping with the car adapter in less than two minutes. Its small but good.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Worked for large blow-up mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This was able to blow up my tripple decker queen blow-up mattress, took maybe 4ish min. Blew up a single twin blow up in 1-2 min.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M

customer_reviews.title: Just like Coleman
customer_reviews.text: Bought this inflator to blow up kiddie toys. So far works great, it’s fast and compact. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Professor TD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pump, except that the nozzle did not stay on the machine so I had to hold in place with my hand while inflating
customer_reviews.author: maria cabezas

customer_reviews.title: Handy to have on boat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to inflate/deflate floats that we keep on our boat. Only negative is the adapters that fit on the intake/outtake valves fit loosely and fall off too easily; otherwise, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: kssams

customer_reviews.title: great little pump ac/dc included
customer_reviews.text: works well on my air mattress so far. not the most durable looking unit but made well enough and Awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.author: thorn726

customer_reviews.title: Product works as described
customer_reviews.text: No issues. This product works as its supposed to. Great for inflating water floats and other stuff like that.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product to have at home
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I bought this to blow up a small pool but now I have it when I need it for other things
customer_reviews.author: Beth Chestnut

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable product
customer_reviews.text: The price on this item is honestly the best value for your dollar. The product is well made and works better than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: FLópez fam

customer_reviews.title: Great little pump!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an inflatable pool and it's perfect! Arrived earlier than expected, too!
customer_reviews.author: shellbelle

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, slowly
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, although very slowly. Took 8-10 minutes to fill up a small, two-person dinghy raft. Still better than a manuel pump, just not as powerful as I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great, everyone needs one
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. Blows the up the kiddy pool, just like that. Small & so easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenka

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Not super high powered but works fine for what we needed, which is to inflate and deflate rafts and floats.
customer_reviews.author: Annie GTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Great value for your money. It inflated all of my pool inflatables without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: rela04

customer_reviews.title: Tiny & works well
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how small it is but works great. Used all Summer for inner tubes & floats. The small size made it super convenient to pack in an already full car.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cranmer

customer_reviews.title: Light, but works well
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this past weekend. As mentioned in other reviews this is very light and feels cheap but seems to work very well... I pumped up 6 pretty large river tubes and boats and it had no problem inflating then later deflating them. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a new portable pool and it did the job! Sure it will be handy for floaties and balls as well.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with clear instructions, great price and fast shipping. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth E. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: If you have floaties you need this pump
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use with our floaties. We have a double tube that we use to go down a river. This pump does a good job with blowing it up and deflating
customer_reviews.author: gali

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I used it once. No problem with the functioning. I will recommend anyone to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Defective, plugged it in and it didn't work. Tryed the 12v same. Did not work. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Terry

customer_reviews.title: Best for 'De-flation'
customer_reviews.text: Very slow with inflation, but works great to deflate for storage of a rubber boat
customer_reviews.author: SleepWalker

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit, but has sloppy fittings
customer_reviews.text: The nozzles do not have enough friction to stay on the pump while inflating. It's a hassle to keep the nozzle in place-not very satisfied with purchase because of that. Otherwise the item works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Good quality. Delivered quickly. Inflates our blow up mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Rider

product_meta.title: Jasonwell Electric Air Pump Portable Quick-Fill AC DC Inflator Deflator Pump for Air Mattress Inflatables Pool Floats Water Toy Raft Bed Boat Pool Toy with Nozzles110-240 V
product_meta.description:
Reversible for inflation and deflation 
AC/DC,50W 
This is a high volume pump. It is intended to inflate/deflate items such as inflatable boats, air mattresses, etc. 
Size:5.5*4.7*4inches 
Package Includes: 
1*air pump 
3*nozzles 
1*adaptor 
1*car-powered plug 
Tips: 
Keep this air pump out of the reach of children. 
Do not exceed 10 minutes of continuous operation for longer lifetime. 
Do not obstruct the inflation/deflation port and keep them ventilated all the time. 
Risk of electric shock, do not operate under moist conditions, and store indoors.
feature_bullets: The stock now is all with US plug. Mistake corrected【2 in 1 AC DC Pump】Quick-Fill electric pump electric pump comes with a US adaptor and Car-powered 12v-DC cigarette for inflating airbeds, rafts, floats and more.

【Quick-Fill High-volume air flow & High Pressure】The pump is equipped with strong quality motor to ensure fast inflation and deflation. Plus with its high pressure, you can inflate the air beds inflatables firm or soft as you want.
【Three Interconnecting Nozzles】Allows you to inflate most inflatable products. But this is not designed to work with needle valves nor stem valves like basketball tires etc.

【Light weight & Portable】Sleek, compact design fits perfectly in the palm of your hand. Easy to take in the car with you to a beach trip. No more trouble of tying Giant inflatables on the roof of your car.
【GUARANTEED WARRANTY】90-DAY Money Back Guarantee. One year warranty . Not intended to be used near or in water.
